subject: Track and Field
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Golf
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Nets had a rally for their fans in Brooklyn, the Tour de France reached Stage 12, and track and field athletes tuned up or tried to qualify for the Olympics in meets in London and Barcelona, Spain.
snippet: The Nets had a rally for their fans in Brooklyn, the Tour de France reached Stage 12, and track and field athletes tuned up or tried to qualify for the Olympics in meets in London and Barcelona, Spain.
